fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: TRAN, ENVI, EMPL, DTLF, Europe on the move (mobility package), access to the EU road haulage market, Social legislation in Road Transport, Innovation, certification procedure of CO2 emissions from HDV ...
organisation_name: ITD – association for the Danish road transport of goods (ITD)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit:
ITD – association for the Danish road transport of goods, is the Danish voice of professionalism, innovation and sustainable market focus in European road transport. 
 
ITD-members are professional within their specific fields and perform a number of services in connection with picking up, warehousing, processing and distribution of goods and further specialization in selected niches. 
 
ITD offers specific advice, specialist know-how, news and information, professional networking and trade political influence with fast access to the policymaking processes to our members. 
 
ITD endeavor to ensure our members the best possible conditions and are constantly working to improve the competitiveness of our members by providing the best possible framework conditions for transport and logistics companies.
